sentences: Nad on võimelised lahendama keerulisi probleeme.
Lapsed on väga võimelised õppima uusi asju.
Meie meeskond on võimeliseid saavutama head tulemusi.
context: The Estonian word 'võimelised' is the plural nominative form of 'võimeline', meaning 'capable' or 'competent'. It describes people or entities that have ability, skill, or capacity to do something. In this context from a chemistry textbook, it appears in the definition of acids as compounds that are capable of donating protons.
